plugin.commands.name: onMessageFromHTMLView
plugin.commands.description: Dashboard: Callback function to receive messages from HTML view

plugin.settings.title: Show referenced items in separate section?
plugin.settings.description:
Whether to show Today's open tasks and checklists in two separate sections: first from the daily note itself, and second referenced from project notes.
The same also goes for Weekly/Monthly/Quarterly notes.

plugin.settings.title: Ignore items with this phrase
plugin.settings.description: If set, open tasks/checklists with this word or tag will be ignored, and not counted as open or closed. This is useful for situations where completing the item is outside your control.

plugin.settings.title: Folders to ignore when finding linked items
plugin.settings.description: If set, the contents of these folder(s) will be ignored when searching for open or closed tasks/checklists. This is useful where you are using sync'd lines in search results.

plugin.settings.title: Include context for tasks?
plugin.settings.description: Whether to show the note link for an open task or checklist

plugin.settings.title: Include folder name?
plugin.settings.description: Whether to include the folder name when showing a note link

plugin.settings.title: Default window height
plugin.settings.description: Default window height (in pixels) when the dashboard is displayed

plugin.settings.title: Default window width
plugin.settings.description: Default window width (in pixels) when the dashboard is displayed

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description:
Set how much logging output will be displayed when executing Tidy commands in NotePlan Plugin Console Logs (NotePlan -> Help -> Plugin Console)

 - DEBUG: Show All Logs
 - INFO: Only Show Info, Warnings, and Errors
 - WARN: Only Show Errors or Warnings
 - ERROR: Only Show Errors
 - none: Don't show any logs
